game.name: Army of Soldiers Resistance
game.description:
This is actually the big time since you have taken a big responsibility of saving the planet from the invaders who are continuously coming to you! Hey, donâ€™t take them easily! They are just like the deadly monsters who will not show pity on you and invade your planet shortly. Luckily, you have got the charge of handling a team of soldiers and heroes who are ready to give their lives to save your country. All you need is to guide them towards the winning over the invaders and protecting your home!

Do you think that you are the right candidate for this job? Join Army of Soldiers: Resistance game to become a saviour for people who need your help urgently! In this brand new action game, you have to apply the strategy and use your concentration skill to achieve the goal of the game. Get yourself ready to show off your ultimate fighting skills to win this newest tower defense game! On the screen, you will see that one soldier will be facing on the left and the other one on the right. Enter this shooting game to take out the enemies coming from the different directions!

Defeat the invaders to take the right decisions and actions with the help of mouse! Collect the funds by winning and use them to upgrade your soldiers and power! Be careful all the time in this free online HTML5 game since a horde of monsters and bad creatures will keep coming from another world! Shoot them immediately when you see before they kill you! Show your strong moves and become a winner of the epic battle! Good luck to play the role of the best commander in our one of the best fighting games!
